item.title: Sara add a quote by Rafael Sabatini
item.description: "He was born with a gift of laughter and a sense that the world was mad." -- Rafael Sabatini

item.title: Sara add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There are few people whom I really love, and still fewer of whom I think well. The more I see of the world, the more am I dissatisfied with it; and every day confirms my belief of the inconsistency of all human characters, and of the little dependence that can be placed on the appearance of merit or sense." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Sara add a quote by Galations 3:28
item.description: "You are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus, for all of you who were baptized into Christ have clothed yourselves with Christ. There is neither Jew nor Greek, slave nor free, male nor female, for you are all one in Christ Jesus. If you belong to Christ, then you are Abraham's seed, and heirs according to the promise" -- Galations 3:28
